description:
Sandstone towers or Bugaboo granite come with the potential for bone-penetrating wind and fast moving storms. Wind and water resistant fabric sheds chilly gusts or light rain you encounter while belaying high off the deck or scrambling the summit ridge. Breathable fabric provides you the freedom to move, as well as durability and abrasion resistance for rugged rock and alpine environments.

  • Stretch woven nylon (46% recycled content) and spandex ripstop is breathable and durable
  • Fabric has UPF 50+ sun protection
  • Belt loops and full zip fly with snap
  • Brushed-tricot lined waistband with dracord is comfortable against the skin
  • Zippered thigh pocket keeps essentials secure
  • Articulated knees ensure mobility for high steps and other mobility demanding maneouvers
  • Drawcord ankle adjustments keep out snow or wind and retain heat
name: Outdoor Research Ferrosi Pants - Women's
